debtor client (also for legal owner) by calls to BDH006

GSET_ID = 145

detected by BDC308, will be displayed via BDC308 now

in both parts where DEBC will be created

on 5.7.2004 WJ SCR6571 add new test and message

// 29-JUL-2003 AS, added new parameter to BDC121 call (-> SCR 3985)

END ONLINE
record changed
plausis ok (has to be done on one tansaction)
plausis not ok
END VALIDATION
cancel changes ='N'
cancel changes <>'Y'
END CANCEL
// if input parameter for ADMNO and CLNTNO >0 set change to TRUE
// so the prog guarantee that updates will run !
-- Reset variables
-- Check if new debtor is allowed

ExpSyntax.val: ViewMod (0) AND Level (0)='RM' AND NOT ({0,8}) OR {1,18} AND NOT ({0,8})
NOT (GetParam ('ERROR')) OR GetParam ('ERROR') AND GetParam ('ERROR_NR')=1 AND SetParam ('ERROR','FALSE'LOG)
NOT (GetParam ('ERROR')) OR GetParam ('ERROR') AND GetParam ('ERROR_NR')=2 AND SetParam ('ERROR','FALSE'LOG)

Text.val: set ERROR=true, if not plausis
set ERROR=false, if plausis
-- new debtor is not allowed
-- If ODH003B is called form the search screen, the new debtor has to be added
to the result table of the search screen
-- Add legal owner if not already exists
